name: Fantasy Story: Lord of Darkness
summary:
Immerse yourself in a world of fierce battles and uncover a mystery plot against your Kingdom. After millions of years, the knights of the Dark Lord, which were considered dead came back to the Earth and your Kingdom was plunged into the darkness. Go to a lair of the Dark Lord and destroy him. You are the last hope of your people!
You have to go into an epic adventure by hacking your way through hordes of enemies and defending castles of allies.
